name: Physics Cube
description:
Marble games have always been a classic part of gaming. Rolling around, trying to get the best times on your favorite wacky courses.

However, those games weren't meant to be played as a sharp-edged cube. That is, until now!

Get ready to 'roll' around crazy platform stages, jump from ledge to ledge, and score the fastest times in this odd platform time trial game where you play as a cube.

Physics Cube will test your skill, wit and patience! Happy cubing.

(Game still in development so any feedback is greatly appreciated and welcomed.)
